name: orchon
description: Infrastructure Observatory - monitoring, control plane, and mobile app

scripts.deploy:web: cd web && npm run build && wrangler pages deploy .svelte-kit/cloudflare --project-name=orchon
scripts.deploy:droplet: ssh root@209.38.85.244 'cd /root/orchon && git pull && systemctl restart orchon-bot orchon-ws orchon-updates'
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:web && npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:droplet
scripts.app:build: cd app && flutter build apk --release --dart-define=ORCHON_API_SECRET=$(grep API_SECRET .env | cut -d= -f2) --dart-define=WS_URL=ws://209.38.85.244:8405
scripts.app:ship: npm run app:build && npm run app:publish
